For some reason, the final value for the subtract sens is opposite in sign. 

For example : 

                 0.018 frac of btp             pure methane                  subtracted            whats actually in file
________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

H+O2=O+OH       0.5415979213293005           0.4800130113283822           0.061584910000918314     -0.061584910000918314

HCO+M=CO+H+M    0.13387234808594217          0.1074913356099299           0.026381012476012267     -0.026381012476012267
